description: A delicious and spicy chicken curry that is perfect for dinner. This recipe is easy to make and is sure to impress your guests!
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
cookingSteps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
Add the onion, garlic, and ginger and cook for 2-3 minutes, until softened.
Stir in the curry powder, cumin, coriander, and cayenne pepper and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
Add the diced tomatoes and bring to a simmer.
Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.
Stir in the cilantro and season with salt and pepper, to taste.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

description: This pasta dish is quick and easy to make, but it tastes like it came from a fancy Italian restaurant. The garlic and shrimp flavors combine perfectly with the linguine noodles.
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
cookingSteps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Add the linguine and cook according to package directions.
While the pasta is cooking, melt the butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
Add the shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes, until pink and cooked through.
Stir in the white wine, salt, and black pepper and bring to a simmer.
Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly.
Drain the linguine and add it to the skillet with the shrimp and sauce.
Toss to combine and coat the pasta with the sauce.
Sprinkle with fresh parsley and Parmesan cheese before serving.

description: A creamy and delicious curry made with prawns and coconut milk, perfect for a special occasion.
cookingMethod: Clean and devein the prawns, and keep aside.
Heat some oil in a pan and fry the chopped onions until they are translucent.
Add the ginger paste and garlic, and fry for another minute.
Add the spices and fry for a few seconds until fragrant.
Add the prawns and fry for a few minutes until they turn pink.
Add the coconut milk and salt to taste, and bring to a simmer.
Cook for another 5-7 minutes until the curry thickens and the prawns are cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with rice.

description: A spicy and flavorful beef curry that is slow-cooked to perfection.
cookingMethod: Heat some oil in a pan and fry the onions until they are golden brown.
Add the garlic and ginger, and fry for another minute.
Add the beef and fry for a few minutes until it is browned on all sides.
Add the spices and fry for a few seconds until fragrant.
Add the chopped tomatoes and salt to taste, and cook for another few minutes until the tomatoes are soft.
Transfer the mixture to a slow cooker and cook on low for 6-8 hours.
Sprinkle with garam masala and serve hot with naan or rice.
